languages.text: За ним последовало сообщение от второго отряда, находящегося на палубе экипажа. Динамик вокса захрипел, готовясь соединить с командиром — капитаном Вести. Речь, звучащая из них, казалась приглушенной, будто человек не говорил в вокс, а нечаянно нажал на кнопку передачи, занимаясь каким-то своим делом. "Никогда такого не видел..." — донеслось из динамика. "Красиво! Подождите... подождите... оно что, движется?!"

This was followed by a message from the second unit, which was on the crew deck. The vox-speakers crackled, preparing to connect with the unit's commander, Captain Vesti. The words that came through sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but accidentally pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"
languages.original_text: За ним последовало сообщение от второго отряда, находящегося на палубе экипажа. Динамик вокса захрипел, готовясь соединить с командиром — капитаном Вести. Речь, звучащая из них, казалась приглушенной, будто человек не говорил в вокс, а нечаянно нажал на кнопку передачи, занимаясь каким-то своим делом. "Никогда такого не видел..." — донеслось из динамика. "Красиво! Подождите... подождите... оно что, движется?!"

traits.locale_text: This was followed by a message from the second unit, which was on the crew deck. The vox speakers crackled, preparing to connect with the unit's commander, Captain Vesti. The words that came through sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but desperately pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait.... is it — is it moving?"

This was followed by a message from the second unit, which was on the crew deck. The vox speakers crackled, preparing to connect with the unit's commander, Captain Vesti. The words that came through sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but desperately pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait.... is it — is it moving?"

This was followed by a message from the second unit, which was on the crew deck. The vox speakers crackled, preparing to connect with the unit's commander, Captain Vesti. The words that came through sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but desperately pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait.... is it — is it moving?"

This was followed by a message from the second unit, which was on the crew deck. The vox-speakers crackled, preparing to connect with the unit's commander, Captain Vesti. The words that came through sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but accidentally pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"

languages.text: A esto le siguió un mensaje de la segunda unidad, que había acudido a la cubierta de la tripulación. Los altavoces del voco chisporrotearon, preparándose para conectar al comandante de dicha unidad, el capitán Vesti. Las palabras sonaban amortiguadas, como si la persona en el otro extremo no estuviera hablando al voco, sino pulsando accidentalmente el botón de transmisión mientras hacía otra cosa. «Nunca había visto algo así... ¡Es magnífico! Espera... un momento... se... ¿Se ha movido?».
languages.original_text: This was followed by a message from the second unit, which was on the crew deck. The vox-speakers crackled, preparing to connect with the unit's commander, Captain Vesti. The words that came through sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but accidentally pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"

traits.locale_text: A esto le siguió un mensaje de la segunda unidad, que había acudido a la cubierta de la tripulación. Los altavoces del voco chisporrotearon, preparándose para conectar al comandante de dicha unidad, el capitán Vesti. Las palabras sonaban amortiguadas, como si la persona en el otro extremo no estuviera hablando al voco, sino pulsando accidentalmente el botón de transmisión mientras hacía otra cosa. «Nunca había visto algo así... ¡Es magnífico! Espera... un momento... se... ¿Se ha movido?».

languages.text: 随后是来自第二小队的信息，小队正在调查船员甲板。音阵扬声器中发出了噼里啪啦的声音，与第二小队指挥官维斯提上尉取得了联系。扬声器的声音听起来很模糊，似乎那边的人并没有直接对着音阵装置讲话，而是在忙于其他的事情的时候，不小心按住了发送按钮。“我从来没见过这样的东西……它实在是太美了！等等……它……它是在动吗？”
languages.original_text: This was followed by a message from the second unit, which was on the crew deck. The vox-speakers crackled, preparing to connect with the unit's commander, Captain Vesti. The words that came through sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but accidentally pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"

traits.locale_text: 随后是来自第二小队的信息，小队正在调查船员甲板。音阵扬声器中发出了噼里啪啦的声音，与第二小队指挥官维斯提上尉取得了联系。扬声器的声音听起来很模糊，似乎那边的人并没有直接对着音阵装置讲话，而是在忙于其他的事情的时候，不小心按住了发送按钮。“我从来没见过这样的东西……它实在是太美了！等等……它……它是在动吗？”

languages.text: これに続いて、クルーデッキにいた第2部隊からメッセージが届いた。ヴォクスのスピーカーがパチパチと音を立てて、部隊の司令であるヴェスティ中隊長と接続する準備をする。その言葉はくぐもっており、まるで相手がヴォクスに直接話しているのではなく、何か他のことに夢中で必死に送信ボタンを押しているかのようだ。「こんなもの見たことない…美しい！ちょっと…待て…これは、何が動いて…？」
languages.original_text: This was followed by a message from the second unit, which was on the crew deck. The vox-speakers crackled, preparing to connect with the unit's commander, Captain Vesti. The words that came through sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but accidentally pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"

traits.locale_text: これに続いて、クルーデッキにいた第2部隊からメッセージが届いた。ヴォクスのスピーカーがパチパチと音を立てて、部隊の司令であるヴェスティ中隊長と接続する準備をする。その言葉はくぐもっており、まるで相手がヴォクスに直接話しているのではなく、何か他のことに夢中で必死に送信ボタンを押しているかのようだ。「こんなもの見たことない…美しい！ちょっと…待て…これは、何が動いて…？」

languages.text: Als Nächstes kam eine Nachricht von der zweiten Einheit, die sich auf dem Crewdeck befand. Die Vox-Lautsprecher knisterten, und dann stand die Verbindung mit dem Commander der Einheit, Captain Vesti. Die übertragenen Worte waren jedoch gedämpft, als spräche die Person am anderen Ende nicht direkt in das Gerät, sondern würde versehentlich die Sendetaste drücken, während sie mit etwas anderem beschäftigt war. "So etwas habe ich noch nie gesehen ... Es ist wunderschön! Moment ... wartet ... bewegt es sich?"
languages.original_text: This was followed by a message from the second unit, which was on the crew deck. The vox-speakers crackled, preparing to connect with the unit's commander, Captain Vesti. The words that came through sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but accidentally pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"

traits.locale_text: Als Nächstes kam eine Nachricht von der zweiten Einheit, die sich auf dem Crewdeck befand. Die Vox-Lautsprecher knisterten, und dann stand die Verbindung mit dem Commander der Einheit, Captain Vesti. Die übertragenen Worte waren jedoch gedämpft, als spräche die Person am anderen Ende nicht direkt in das Gerät, sondern würde versehentlich die Sendetaste drücken, während sie mit etwas anderem beschäftigt war. "So etwas habe ich noch nie gesehen ... Es ist wunderschön! Moment ... wartet ... bewegt es sich?"

languages.text: Une communication de la deuxième unité, qui se trouvait sur le pont de l'équipage, leur parvint ensuite. Les synthétiseurs crépitèrent pendant que le vox établissait la liaison avec le capitaine Vesti. La voix qu'ils entendirent était étouffée, comme si la personne ne parlait pas directement dans le vox, mais avait appuyé sur le bouton de transmission involontairement tout en étant occupée par autre chose. « Je n'ai jamais rien vu de tel... C'est magnifique ! Une minute... Je rêve ou... ça a bougé ? »
languages.original_text: This was followed by a message from the second unit, which was on the crew deck. The vox-speakers crackled, preparing to connect with the unit's commander, Captain Vesti. The words that came through sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but accidentally pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"

traits.locale_text: Une communication de la deuxième unité, qui se trouvait sur le pont de l'équipage, leur parvint ensuite. Les haut-parleurs crépitèrent pendant que le vox établissait la liaison avec le capitaine Vesti. La voix qu'ils entendirent était étouffée, comme si la personne ne parlait pas directement dans le vox, mais avait appuyé sur le bouton de transmission involontairement tout en étant occupée par autre chose. « Je n'ai jamais rien vu de tel... C'est magnifique ! Une minute... Je rêve ou... ça a bougé ? »

languages.text: İlk birimin mesajını, mürettebat güvertesinde ilerleyen ikinci birimin mesajı izledi. Voks hoparlörleri cızırdayarak Yüzbaşı Vesti'nin mesajını iletmeye hazırlanıyordu. Kelimelerin boğukluğu, voksun öbür ucundaki kişinin doğrudan voksa konuşmadığı izlenimini uyandırıyordu. Sanki başka bir şeyle meşgulken ezkaza ileti düğmesine basıyordu... "Daha önce böyle bir şey görmemiştim... Ne kadar da güzel! Bir saniye... Kıpırdıyor mu o?"
languages.original_text: This was followed by a message from the second unit, which was on the crew deck. The vox-speakers crackled, preparing to connect with the unit's commander, Captain Vesti. The words that came through sounded muffled, as though the person on the other end wasn't speaking directly into the vox, but accidentally pressing the transmit button while occupied with something else. "Never seen anything like it... It's beautiful! Hold on... wait... is it — is it moving?"

traits.locale_text: İlk birimin mesajını, mürettebat güvertesinde ilerleyen ikinci birimin mesajı izledi. Voks hoparlörleri cızırdayarak Yüzbaşı Vesti'nin mesajını iletmeye hazırlanıyordu. Kelimelerin boğukluğu, voksun öbür ucundaki kişinin, doğrudan voksa konuşmadığı izlenimini uyandırıyordu. Sanki başka bir şeyle meşgulken ezkaza ileti düğmesine basıyordu… "Daha önce böyle bir şey görmemiştim… Ne kadar da güzel! Bir saniye… O… Kıpırdıyor mu?"
